story: If you spend your life investigator crime, youll encounter plenty of hard play, as they say. But Allan Jenkins figured hed be foiling plots, protecting wealthy businessmen, and investigator murders. Not poring aver arcand tomes, searchirig for mystical objects, and staring down fanatical, demon-worshiping cuttists. Yet, Allans a practical man who quickly ddeipts to each situation, He doesnt spook easy, and he gain afraid to-draw-down on the cultists and demons alike. Itll take more than a lot of wiggly-fingered mystic jutnbo to get the better of Al Jenkins!
